attributes.action: get rid of un-needed benifits and social workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people in this country believe that benifits are given to people who do not need it and infact choose benifits over working. because of the benifits given to young mothers(such as house, money) teens choose to become pregnate to not work. i know of atleast 56 people who dont need benifits but claim because the government doesnt stop them. most can afford more than the working class. so lets get rid of these scroungers and Lower our TAX
